title: IP Gifting
body: When will this ever be a thing?

replies.body:
no... because that would be giving something to someone for free. Riot in no way makes money from that LOL

Some people who have played this game for 3+ years have enough IP to buy a new account all the champs and a couple of rune pages LOL
You know what I'd love having 10 trillion bot accounts farming ip and ruining games, no thanks I'll pass and just buy RP to gift thanks.
should have a trade system once you have bought all champs and rune pages you can trade 10000 ip for 100 rp min is 10000
This would literally lose Riot money.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XwjXNlJF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-02-04T04:26:47.552+0000)
>
> This would literally lose Riot money.

10,0000 or 100,000 min for 100 rp
id rather buy the rp than grind 100000 ip to get a measly 100rp.....................

> [{quoted}](name=Wumachine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XwjXNlJF,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-04T09:18:47.079+0000)
>
> id rather buy the rp than grind 100000 ip to get a measly 100rp.....................

that's the point
